mapper.insert: insert into bbs(id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readCount) values (#{id}, (select ifnull(max(ref)+1, 0) from bbs a), 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0)
mapper.select:
select seq, id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readCount from bbs
where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where id like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
order by ref desc, step asc

select seq, id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readCount from (select row_number() over (order by ref desc, step asc) as rnum, seq, id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readCount from bbs
where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where id like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
order by ref desc, step asc) as a where rnum between ${start} and ${end}

select ifnull(count(*), 0) from bbs
where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where id like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
